banner.subtitle: Starts at ₹149. Cancel at any time.
banner.ready: Ready to watch? Enter your email to create or restart your membership.

home.ready: Ready to watch? Enter your email to create or restart your membership.

faq1.question: What is Netflix?
faq1.answer: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more.

faq2.question: How much does Netflix cost?
faq2.answer: Watch Netflix on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee.

faq3.question: Where can I watch?
faq3.answer: You can watch anywhere, anytime, on an unlimited number of devices.

faq4.question: How do I cancel?
faq4.answer: You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees.

faq5.question: What can I watch on Netflix?
faq5.answer: You can watch TV shows, movies, documentaries, and more.

faq6.question: Is Netflix good for kids?
faq6.answer: Netflix has a dedicated kids experience with parental controls.

tv.reason: Watch on smart TVs, PlayStation, Xbox, Chromecast, Apple TV, Blu-ray players and more.

download.feature: Download your shows to watch offline
download.reason: Save your favourites easily and always have something to watch.

everywhere.reason: Stream unlimited movies and TV shows on your phone, tablet, laptop and TV.

kids.reason: Send children on adventures with their favourite characters in a space made just for them—free with your membership.
